attributes.action: help us get Tom Hicks and George Gillet out of LFC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Encourage the Royal Bank of Scotland NOT to give these two corrupt owners the refinancing deal renewal in January. They have sucked the life and soul of of our club long enough and we as fans have no substantial voice, despite the best efforts of ShareLiverpoolFC and Spirit of Shankly. This petition may just be the leverage we need.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
